    • Constructor Detail

      • EInitNewGame

        public EInitNewGame(java.lang.Object source,
            int eventType,
            IAPlayer player,
            IAFigure figure)
        The initNewGame Event-class has a reference to all data the GState needs.
        Parameters:
        source - event source
        eventType - the event Type
        player - the APlayer used to parse the relevant data into the event
        figure - the AFigure used to parse the relevant data into the event
